talents.desc: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.
talents.name: Regeneration Master

talents.desc: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.
talents.name: Amplified Healing

talents.desc: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 10 Health per second.
talents.name: Brewmaster's Balance

talents.desc:
Split into three elemental spirits for 15.15 seconds, each with 50% of your maximum Health, and enables two new leaping attacks for use.
Storm attacks at range for 30 damage. 
Earth attacks slowly for 20 damage and slows enemies by 25%. 
Fire attacks quickly for 18 damage.
talents.name: Storm, Earth, Fire

talents.desc: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.
talents.name: A Touch of Honey

talents.desc: The next Basic Attack after using Flying Kick deals 100% bonus damage.
talents.name: Combination Attack

talents.desc: Using an Ability will cause one of the elemental spirits to fight with you for 4 seconds. Only one spirit can be active at a time.
talents.name: Elemental Conduit
